0.text: Bug 124610  Add a filter on a boolean computed column will cause error..

1.text: Description: Add a filter on a boolean computed column will cause error.

3.text: New a BIRT sample data source and a dataset from table "orders" 2.

4.text: Create a computed column with name="yes/no", type = any(no boolean for choose),      value= if(row[1]%2==0){ true; }else{ false; } 3.

5.text: Drag the dataset from Data Explorer to Layout 4.

6.text: Select the table, click Filters tab in Property Editor.

10.text: Select yes/no as Expression, Is True as Operator.

14.text: Actual result: Error0 : data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError ( 1 time(s) ) detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException:  can not be converted to class java.lang.Boolean.
